channel.title: How do i make a invisable login screen?
channel.description: how to i create a invisible login screen that allows me to see the back ground picture behind it?

item.title: How do i make a invisable login screen?

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“ShadowDD, post:2, topic:314553”]In spirits or in just the main file I think there is a login box if you just delete it I belive what you want will happen :)…Actually it might not becuase of the action bars included with the Login box so you might have to try to find one but you can try that :P[/quote]He can remove the login box but not the buttons.

In spirits or in just the main file I think there is a login box if you just delete it I belive what you want will happen :)…Actually it might not becuase of the action bars included with the Login box so you might have to try to find one but you can try that
